 Set Up: .HuntTheWumpus.SetUp (edit)
script HuntTheWumpus.fixtures.GameDriver

Import
HuntTheWumpus.fixtures
If the player has a trap he is allowed to leave it in a cavern so that the wumpus will encounter it.
